…support of the FAST  VETS Act, Focused Assistance and Skills Training for Veterans'  Employment and Transition Success, or FAST VETS Act.

I am grateful to Representatives Messmer, McGarvey, and Van Orden for  joining me in this bipartisan effort to better serve our Nation's  veterans.
